objects.specification: A smooth, light-colored floor surface with a subtle matte finish. The floor is uniform in tone and provides a bright, clean base for the classroom.
A flat, white wall with a smooth matte finish. The wall surface is plain and bright, creating a simple modern classroom environment.
A flat, white wall with a smooth matte finish. The wall surface is plain and bright, creating a simple modern classroom environment.
A flat, white wall with a smooth matte finish. The wall surface is plain and bright, creating a simple modern classroom environment.
A flat, white wall with a smooth matte finish. The wall surface is plain and bright, creating a simple modern classroom environment.
A large rectangular teacher's desk featuring a rich dark wood tone finish on the top, supported by sturdy legs in matching wood. The desk has a smooth, polished surface.
An ergonomic teacher chair with a cushioned seat and back upholstered in a neutral complementary fabric. The chair has a wooden frame with armrests, providing comfortable support.
A large rectangular whiteboard with a glossy white surface and a slim aluminum frame. The board is sleek and provides ample writing space for classroom instruction.
A compact ceiling-mounted projector with an off-white housing and sleek design. The projector has ventilation grills and lens housing for modern presentation functionality.
A tall wooden bookshelf with a natural wood finish, featuring multiple evenly spaced shelves filled with colorful books. The shelf has a simple design with clean lines.
A large rectangular window with a slim frame and clear transparent glass. The window allows abundant natural light into the classroom.
A set of light fabric curtains in a soft complementary color, featuring gentle folds and hung from a concealed rail. The curtains frame the window elegantly.
A circular wall clock with a minimalist design, featuring a white face, black hour and minute hands, and simple hour markers in contrasting color.
A potted plant with vibrant green foliage and slender stems, placed in a simple cylindrical pot. The plant adds a touch of natural greenery to the space.
A small cylindrical waste bin in neutral gray plastic with smooth sides and a simple open-top design.
A small cylindrical waste bin in neutral gray plastic with smooth sides and a simple open-top design.
A circular recessed ceiling light fixture with diffused bright white illumination. The fixture has a slim profile and modern appearance.
A circular recessed ceiling light fixture with diffused bright white illumination. The fixture has a slim profile and modern appearance.
A circular recessed ceiling light fixture with diffused bright white illumination. The fixture has a slim profile and modern appearance.

An educational poster printed on glossy paper featuring vibrant images and informative educational content, housed in a slim minimal frame.

A standard rectangular student desk with a light wood grain finish tabletop and slim metal legs in neutral tone. The desk has a clean, simple school design with rounded edges for safety.
A simple school chair with a light wood seat and backrest, supported by slim metal legs. The chair has a complementary finish to the student desks and a sturdy, minimalist design.
